name: MixMob
intro: A Game Universe on Remix Culture
introduce: MixMob mashes music, fashion, art, and movies, into one metaverse game on remix culture. ‍Phase I of development is a card-based racing game with phase II expanding into a comprehensive, Fortnite-like world. Users’ll be able to wear NFT based masks as well as owning NFT based pets called MixBots. These pets evolve depending on their owners activity in the metaverse.
